## Alternatives

Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

- [ ] Improves user experience
- [ ] Increases functionality
- [ ] Enhances performance
- [ ] Aligns with roadmap
- [ ] Addresses user feedback
- [ ] Other: (please describe)
